name: Sunshine Diner

review.reviewBody: Great eggs Classic Eggs Benedict and Crispy Chicken Benny! Hill andais sauce was super! The only downside was no syrup or ketchup.
the hollandaise sauce was a bit sour this time but otherwise good
Honestly, never left a review in my life. But this is the best thing I have ever ordered off door dash! Tastes amazing!!
French Toast Breakfast slaps hard. Sunshine Diner never disappoints.
Best  Seafood Benedict and Crispy Chicken Benny ever!
